mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_line VALUES(#{apNo}, #{alNo}, #{alOrder}, 0, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT ap_no, em_no AS al_no, al_order, al_status, al_date, al_comment, em_name, po_name, de_name FROM approval_line al JOIN employee e ON al.al_no = e.em_no JOIN position p ON e.po_no = p.po_no JOIN department d ON e.de_no = d.de_no WHERE ap_no = #{apNo} order by al_order
SELECT em_no, em_name, po_name, de_name, e.po_no FROM employee e JOIN position p ON e.po_no = p.po_no JOIN department d ON e.de_no = d.de_no order by de_name, po_no
